name: Xander: Shard Travellers
description:
Xander: Shard Travellers is a game made by Stargaze Studio and is about the following story: 

"During a massive battle, Xander, the Warping Hero got knocked unconcious and crashlanded in an unknown Forest, there he is awoken by Chika, A lost girl who has nowhere to go. The two came to the conclusion that Xander suffers from Partial Memory Loss and only remembers his Powers and what they do, and with that.
The two set off on a quest to return Xander's memories and find the person who was responsible for it."

The 3-Stage Demo only includes Xander as a Playable Character. But as time will go on, this will be updated etc. That being said, hope everyone has fun!
